title: A Sketch Page of Hands
medium: black and white chalk with colored chalk
credit_line: Gift of Dr. and Mrs. Daniel Fishkoff
provenance_text: M. de Bourguignon de Fabregoules, Aix-en-Provence in early 19th century; c. 1840 transferred to M. Charles-Joseph-Barthélemi Giraud (1802-1882), Provence and Paris until 1861; given by him to the banker Flury-Hérard [Lugt 1015] in lieu of repayment of debts in 1861; possibly sale, Paris, 13-15 May, 1861 [expert Blaisot]; Dr. And Mrs. Daniel Fishkoff, Colonia, NJ

creator.birth_place: Paris (Ville de Paris department, Île-de-France, France)
creator.death_place: Paris (Ville de Paris department, Île-de-France, France)
